topic.title: `ignore` patterns fail (on windows at least)
topic.body:
i tried simple dotfile hiding with `\..*` (escaped as `"ignore": "\\..*)"` yet my `.test` file still got served

also the sample from the docs fails for me: `http://localhost:43110/…/css/test.css` was served

OS: win7
Method of installation: ZeroBundle package

1604064827_mirrored_vprimachenko_github.body: thanks, the part that those files can be accessed locally should be noted in the docs
